    MsgBox "「管理変動費Master」登録し、開いていますか？", vb
    
  Dim Msg, style, title, help, ctxt, respnse, mystring
    Msg = "計算用管理変動費Masterに管理変動費Master電気合計データをコピーします"
    style = vbYesNo + vbCritical + vbDefaultButton2
    title = "msgbox 確認"
    help = "demo.hlp"
    ctxt = 1000
      response = MsgBox(Msg, style, title, help, ctext)
  If response = vbYes Then
      mystrings = "yes"



'
    Range("A19").Select
    Windows("管理変動費Master.xls").Activate
    Sheets("電気使用料(合計)").Select
    Range("E2:E300").Select

    Windows("計算用管理変動費Master.xls").Activate

        :=False, Transpose:=False

    Range("E2").Select
    
End If
    
End Sub
